title: DOJ launches cyber unit with national security focus as China, Russia threats mount
description: The unit will focus on "nation-state threat actors," as concerns over Chinese espionage and Russia-linked ransomware grow steadily.

title: Top tech execs get ready to meet Modi as China's economy falters
description: Apple CEO Tim Cook, Google CEO Sundar Pichai and Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella will be among CEOs attending the Modi-White House state dinner Thursday.

title: Bitcoin hits new high for June as more financial incumbents signal commitment to crypto
description: Bitcoin climbed on Monday as more financial institutions gave their bitcoin blessing after BlackRock filed for a spot bitcoin ETF last week.

title: How to tell your company has layoffs planned. Some signs ‘will send shivers down your spine,’ career expert says
description: Figuring out if your company might be next to announce layoffs isn't easy, but there are some clues to watch for, experts say.

title: Pfizer, Moderna and Novavax gear up for fall Covid vaccine rollout with an important head start
description: The FDA's strain selection puts Pfizer, Moderna and Novavax on track to deliver updated coronavirus shots in time for the fall.

title: Missing Titanic submersible: 41 hours or less of oxygen left, Coast Guard says
description: The OceanGate Expeditions submersible vanished while diving to visit the Titanic. Passengers include Hamish Hardin, and Pakstani businessman Shahzada Dawood

title: Mature content comes to Roblox for users aged 17 and up
description: Roblox announces eligible creators can build experiences with mature content for users 17 and older.

title: Biden to meet with A.I. experts in San Francisco
description: Biden is expected to meet with Center for Humane Technology leader Tristan Harris, Common Sense CEO Jim Steyer, and Khan Academy Founder and CEO Sal Khan.

title: Hunter Biden to plead guilty to federal criminal tax charges
description: Hunter Biden, the son of President Joe Biden, has been under investigation for tax and gun offenses by a Delaware federal prosecutor appointed by Donald Trump.

title: Trump classified documents trial date set for Aug. 14
description: Experts do not expect the criminal trial of former President Donald Trump to begin in August, given the time needed to resolve legal issues beforehand.

title: Alibaba founder Jack Ma's close confidants have taken the top roles at the Chinese tech giant  — Here's who they are
description: Eddie Yongming Wu will become CEO of Alibaba, while Joe Tsai will take over as chairman. Both are close confidants of Alibaba's billionaire founder Jack Ma.

title: 'Tough duel' ahead for Ukraine as Russia mounts fierce resistance to counteroffensive
description: It's becoming increasingly clear that Ukraine could have a long and likely bloody slog ahead of it when it comes to its counteroffensive.

title: UK economy in growth 'doom loop' as business investment slumps versus G7 peers, think tank says
description: Decades of underinvestment by government and business have left Britain's economy in a growth "doom loop," according to center-left think tank IPPR.

title: Blinken says he failed to revive military-to-military talks with China
description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Monday he failed to revive military-to-military communication with China, despite hopes of reopening it.

title: 'When we meet again, may we all be carefree': Read the outgoing Alibaba CEO's memo to staff
description: Outgoing Alibaba CEO Daniel Zhang said the cloud business is "now full speed ahead on its spin-off plans," and that is a reason why he is stepping down as group boss.

title: Dyson doubles down on Singapore and ramps up hiring globally
description: Dyson's  £2.75 billion global investment includes a slate of new generation of products and a giant battery plant in Singapore.

title: 'Hell of a job': Biden's reaction and 5 other takeaways from Blinken's trip to China
description: The U.S. president's comments came after Blinken's high-profile two-day mission to China, aimed at soothing strained ties with China.

title: Alibaba says Eddie Wu to succeed Daniel Zhang as CEO in surprise move
description: Eddie Wu will succeed Daniel Zhang as chief executive of Alibaba Group, the company announced Tuesday, laying out its succession plan.

title: Companies are starting to care more about skills than degrees — here’s how to still make your resume stand out
description: Skills-based hiring is becoming increasingly popular. Recruitment specialists explain why, and what that means for job applications and resumes.

title: Bank of England's conundrum deepens as inflation and labor market stay hot
description: The Bank of England is "caught between a rock and a hard place" as it prepares for a key monetary policy decision.

title: China cuts two more key lending rates as economy sputters
description: The People's Bank of China cut another key policy rate on Tuesday for the first time in 10 months, as the world's second largest economy shows signs of stalling.
